response.description: Standard VAT rate for most goods and services.
Reduced rate for books, e-books and other print publications.
Reduced VAT rate for food products, excluding certain luxury items.
Reduced rate for pharmaceuticals including medicines for human and veterinary use.
Reduced rate for passenger transport services.
Reduced rate for accommodation services in hotels and similar establishments, including providing holiday accommodation and renting out camping grounds and camping facilities.
Reduced rate for newspapers and periodicals, with certain exclusions.
Reduced rate for admission to cultural events and amusement parks.
Reduced rate for the supply of artworks including works of art, collectors' items and antiques.
Reduced rate for certain sporting services and activities.
Reduced rate for social services, care services for the elderly, sick or disabled and children.
Reduced rate for education services including tuition for certain curriculums.
Reduced rate for certain postal services.
Reduced rate for supplies of certain agricultural inputs.
